name: The Lights of a Long Life

metadata.name: Novalunosis
metadata.description:
The state of relaxation and wonderment experienced while gazing upon the stars. An image I created from 2 of my photos taken at the same location which is one of the darkest places in the UAE. 

I visit this place often to sit under the stars. Light pollution has taken over the dark skies. Mostly we all have lost our connections to night skies. I only wish I lived in such a place where I could spend more time (maybe every night) under the dark skies . 


Photographer: Waheed Akhtar

Size: 4800 x 3200 @300dpi


Image Type: Composite
